title: ‘We are in hell!’: Families of Hamas hostages demand more action
description: Friends and families of Hamas hostages protested in central Tel Aviv, demanding greater efforts from their government and the international community to bring their loved ones home.

title: Qatar's strategy: Convince Hamas that freeing hostages is the only way to avert all-out war
description: Qatar hopes that if Hamas frees more hostages it could lead to wider talks on getting humanitarian aid into Gaza and limiting an Israeli military operation there.

title: ‘We will not accept displacement,’ Palestinian president tells peace summit
description: Palestinian President Mahmoud Abbas struck a defiant note at the Cairo peace summit, but also made a point of calling for “the release of all civilians, prisoners and detainees.”

title: 'I will never vote Biden': Some Muslim Americans in a key swing state feel betrayed by the president
description: Muslim and Arab-Americans say their support was critical to Biden’s win in Michigan. Some warn they won’t back him again over his blanket support for Israel.

title: Pro-Palestinian demonstration draws large crowds in London
description: Thousands of people turned out in London to protest against the Israeli bombardment of Gaza.

title: As China strengthens ties with Russia, the Israel-Hamas war deepens their divide with the U.S.
description: The war between Israel and Hamas appears to be deepening the divide between the United States and its allies on one side and China and its partner Russia.

title: Tainted water and viruses put Gaza residents, especially kids, at further risk
description: Clean drinking water is running out in Gaza, further threatening an already catastrophic situation.
